description.value: At 15th level, if your hit points drop below 0, you automatically stabilize and begin regenerating 2 hit points per round for a number of rounds per day equal to your sorcerer level. While regenerating in this way, you are not affected by spells or effects that would cause you to continue dying, such as bleed, but if you take any acid or fire damage, you stop regenerating for the rest of the day (but remain stabilized) and you are affected by such effects as normal. You still die if your hit points reach a negative number equal to your Constitution score, regardless of whether you are regenerating. This ability only works once per dayâ€”if you drop below 0 hit points a second time, you do not benefit from this ability.
